label: Christmas Jumpers
description: Clothing items worn during the Christmas season, typically featuring festive designs and patterns.
intents: Find a Christmas-themed sweater or cardigan to wear during the holiday season.
Purchase a Christmas jumper as a gift for someone else.
Browse the latest trends in Christmas jumpers and sweaters.
Find a specific type of Christmas jumper, such as one with lights or a specific design.
